meanings.definition: A person in charge of a wharf.
meanings.sent1: The wharfmasters oversaw the loading and unloading of ships.
meanings.sent2: The wharfmasters greeted the incoming cargo ships every morning.
meanings.sent3: The wharfmasters organized a fun competition for the dock workers.
meanings.sent4: The wharfmasters were the captains of the bustling harbor.
meanings.sent5: The wharfmasters' authority at the wharf was unquestioned.

meanings.sent1: The wharfmasters were respected figures in the maritime community.
meanings.sent2: The wharfmasters' office was located near the edge of the dock.
meanings.sent3: The wharfmasters enjoyed a friendly rivalry with the ship captains.
meanings.sent4: The wharfmasters' knowledge of the harbor was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The wharfmasters' teamwork ensured smooth operations at the wharf.
